block.p: Dawn Marie Webb, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Dennis R. Webb of Warwick, R.I., is to be married today to Richard Edward French III, a son of Mr. and Mrs. French Jr. of Harrison, N.Y. The Rev. Paul A. Keenan will perform the ceremony at the Roman Catholic Church of the Resurrection in New York.

Ms. Webb, 29, is a recruiter of television news producers, in Kingston, N.Y. She graduated from the University of Rhode Island. Her father is the natural gas pipeline controller at Providence Energy, Rhode Island's public gas utility, in Providence.

Dawn Marie Webb, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Dennis R. Webb of Warwick, R.I., is to be married today to Richard Edward French III, a son of Mr. and Mrs. French Jr. of Harrison, N.Y. The Rev. Paul A. Keenan will perform the ceremony at the Roman Catholic Church of the Resurrection in New York.

Ms. Webb, 29, is a recruiter of television news producers, in Kingston, N.Y. She graduated from the University of Rhode Island. Her father is the natural gas pipeline controller at Providence Energy, Rhode Island's public gas utility, in Providence.

Mr. French, 31, is the general manager of the Regional News Network, a broadcast and cable station in Kingston, N.Y., and the host of ''The Big Story,'' a network talk show. He graduated from Ithaca College. His father is the network's president.
